content.rendered:
Take a video tour of the facility:

NePoPo® New Gold School: upon request

FluentDog Training is proud to certify fellow dog trainers at our NePoPo® New Gold School at our facility just outside of Frederick, MD. This certification opportunity is for trainers who have completed NePoPo® Silver School or New Silver School. In addition to the weeklong hands-on training seminar, the school will also include a virtual marketing audit of each trainer’s business.

Carla LaFleur is a 2022 Gold School graduate and learned directly from Bart and Michael Bellon. She was always a horse girl, and started her dog training business during the pandemic–an unexpectedly ideal time, with so many Covid puppies! FluentDog quickly outgrew her living space (a condo with no yard) and became a full time job with a beautiful 6 acre facility. 

Prior to becoming a dog trainer, she had a career in communications and marketing in the wealth management field, where she learned how to bring a high-end experience to clients with the perfect balance of personalized attention and technology. She looks forward to sharing the processes she uses in her own business, so trainers can save time on these admin tasks and focus on their true talent of helping dogs and their families.  

In addition to helping hundreds of families with pet dog obedience and behavior modification, Carla trains her 3 personal dogs (2 Goldens and a Dutch Shepherd) in obedience, tracking, bitework and sport search and rescue.

The NePoPo® New Gold School program includes:

  • 5 days of training dogs hands-on at our facility in Ijamsville, MD
  • A marketing and operations audit of your business, with one on one assistance via Zoom
  • Breakfast, lunch, and dinner included
  • Air-conditioned kennel space available
  • Upon satisfactory completion of the program, students will be granted NePoPo® New Gold School certification

Our program is tailor-made for dog training solopreneurs and small business owners. Minimum 3 students to schedule a school. Maximum 10 students per school.

Please contact us below to indicate your interest in the program. We will confirm your Silver School graduation status and proceed with further details.  Marketing audit days (virtual) will be scheduled prior to the live school.
